strapiPost.title: Weekend Roundup
strapiPost.content:
Weekends in NWA never have a dull moment, and this weekend is no exception.

  • So organized: Downtown Rogers weekly DTR Market brings live music, dancing, and more to the area.
  • Critical Mass Summit: Today and tomorrow the Summit looks to create more inclusivity in cycling for NWA.
  • Family fun: The Splashpad Summer Movie Series continues tonight at Shaw park in Springdale.
  • Skate stop: The AR Crown Championship skate tour is making its stop at the Momentary tomorrow.
  • Gravel for a Cause: Saturday, nonprofit Pedal It Forward is inviting folks out to a gravel bike ride.
  • Two for one: Two shows, one cast, one great theater. Visit the Arkansas Public Theater to learn more.
  • Birthday wishes: Local cidery Black Apple is celebrating its sixth Birthday Bash in Springdale this Sunday.
  • Boot tapping fun: KUAF threw together their weekend music roundup with events happening daily.

See you Monday!
